                recruit "Aichmetai NAchaean"  0  requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, parthia, egyptian, greek, roman, } and hidden_resource nachean
                recruit "Aichmetai Islanders"  0  requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, parthia, egyptian, greek, roman, } and hidden_resource island
                recruit "Aichmetai Mysian"  0  requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, parthia, egyptian, greek, roman, } and hidden_resource mysian
                recruit "Aichmetai Anatolian"  0  requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, parthia, egyptian, greek, roman, } and hidden_resource anatolian
                recruit "Sphendonetai SEAchaean"  0  requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, parthia, egyptian, greek, roman, } and hidden_resource seachean
                recruit "Sphendonetai SWAchaean"  0  requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, parthia, egyptian, greek, roman, } and hidden_resource swachean
                recruit "Sphendonetai NAchaean"  0  requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, parthia, egyptian, greek, roman, } and hidden_resource nachean
                recruit "Sphendonetai Islander"  0  requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, parthia, egyptian, greek, roman, } and hidden_resource island
                recruit "Sphendonetai Mysian"  0  requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, parthia, egyptian, greek, roman, } and hidden_resource mysian
                recruit "Xipherai SEAchaean"  0  requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, parthia, egyptian, greek, roman, } and hidden_resource seachean
                recruit "Xipherai SWAchaean"  0  requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, parthia, egyptian, greek, roman, } and hidden_resource swachean
                recruit "Xipherai NAchaean"  0  requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, parthia, egyptian, greek, roman, } and hidden_resource nachean
                recruit "Xipherai EBarbarian"  0  requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, parthia, egyptian, greek, roman, } and hidden_resource ebarbarian

building market
{
    levels trader market forum great_forum curia 
    {
        trader requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, parthia, egyptian, greek, roman, } and hidden_resource noncamp 
        {
            capability
            {
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus 1
                population_growth_bonus bonus 1
            }
            construction  2 
            cost  600 
            settlement_min town
            upgrades
            {
                market
            }
        }
        market requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, parthia, egyptian, greek, roman, } 
        {
            capability
            { 
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus 2
                population_growth_bonus bonus 1
            }
            construction  3 
            cost  1200 
            settlement_min large_town
            upgrades
            {
                forum
            }
        }
        forum requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, parthia, egyptian, greek, roman, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus 3
                population_growth_bonus bonus 1
            }
            construction  4 
            cost  2400 
            settlement_min city
            upgrades
            {
                great_forum
            }
        }
        great_forum requires factions { carthaginian, eastern, parthia, egyptian, greek, roman, } 
        {
            capability
            {  
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus 4
                population_growth_bonus bonus 2
            }
            construction  6 
            cost  4800 
            settlement_min large_city
            upgrades
            {
                curia
            }
        }
        curia requires factions { carthaginian, eastern, parthia, egyptian, greek, roman, } 
        {
            capability
            {  
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus 5
                population_growth_bonus bonus 2
                happiness_bonus bonus 2
            }
            construction  7 
            cost  9600 
            settlement_min huge_city
            upgrades
            {
            }
        }
    }
    plugins 
    {
    }
}
building smith
{
    levels blacksmith smiths_workshop foundry 
    {
        blacksmith requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, parthia, egyptian, greek, roman, }  and building_present_min_level market trader
        {
            capability
            { 
                weapon_simple 1
                weapon_bladed 1
            }
            construction  3 
            cost  1200 
            settlement_min large_town
            upgrades
            {
                smiths_workshop
            }
        }
        smiths_workshop requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, parthia, egyptian, greek, roman, }  and building_present_min_level market market
        {
            capability
            {
                weapon_simple 1
                weapon_bladed 1
                weapon_missile 1
                armour 1
            }
            construction  4 
            cost  2400 
            settlement_min city
            upgrades
            {
                foundry
            }
        }
        foundry requires factions { carthaginian, eastern, parthia, egyptian, greek, roman, }  and building_present_min_level market great_forum
        {
            capability
            { 
                weapon_simple 2
                weapon_bladed 2
                weapon_missile 2
                armour 2
            }
            construction  6 
            cost  6400 
            settlement_min huge_city
            upgrades

            }
        }
    }
    plugins

    }
}
building port_buildings
{
    levels port shipwright dockyard 
    {
        port requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, parthia, egyptian, greek, roman, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                recruit "naval biremes"  0  requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, parthia, egyptian, greek, roman, } 
                recruit "Akontistai SEAchaean"  0  requires factions { egypt, romans_senate, parthia, } 
                recruit "Akontistai SWAchaean"  0  requires factions { romans_julii, romans_brutii, macedon, } 
                recruit "Akontistai NAchaean"  0  requires factions { romans_scipii, seleucid, gauls, } 
                recruit "Akontistai EBarbarian"  0  requires factions { barbarian, } 
                recruit "Akontistai Islander"  0  requires factions { carthage, pontus, slave, } 
                recruit "Akontistai Mysian"  0  requires factions { britons, } 
                recruit "Akontistai Anatolian"  0  requires factions { dacia, armenia, } 
                trade_fleet 1 ;trade_base_income_bonus bonus 1  
            }
            construction  2 
            cost  800 
            settlement_min large_town
            upgrades
            {
                shipwright
            }
        }
        shipwright requires factions { barbarian, carthage, eastern, parthia, egyptian, greek, roman, } 
        {
            capability
            { 
                recruit "naval biremes"  0  requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, parthia, egyptian, greek, roman, } 
                recruit "Aichmetai SEAchaean"  0  requires factions { egypt, romans_senate, parthia, } 
                recruit "Aichmetai SWAchaean"  0  requires factions { romans_julii, romans_brutii, macedon, } 
                recruit "Aichmetai NAchaean"  0  requires factions { romans_scipii, seleucid, gauls, } 
                recruit "Aichmetai Islanders"  0  requires factions { carthage, pontus, slave, } 
                recruit "Aichmetai Mysian"  0  requires factions { britons, } 
                recruit "Aichmetai Anatolian"  0  requires factions { dacia, armenia, } 
                recruit "Xipherai EBarbarian"  0  requires factions { barbarian, } 
                recruit "Akontistai SEAchaean"  0  requires factions { egypt, romans_senate, parthia, } 
                recruit "Akontistai SWAchaean"  0  requires factions { romans_julii, romans_brutii, macedon, } 
                recruit "Akontistai NAchaean"  0  requires factions { romans_scipii, seleucid, gauls, } 
                recruit "Akontistai EBarbarian"  0  requires factions { barbarian, } 
                recruit "Akontistai Islander"  0  requires factions { carthage, pontus, slave, }

                trade_fleet 2 ;trade_base_income_bonus bonus 2 
            }
            construction  3 
            cost  1600 
            settlement_min city

            }
        }
        dockyard requires factions { carthage, eastern, parthia, greek, roman, } 
        {
            capability

                recruit "naval biremes"  0  requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, parthia, egyptian, greek, roman, } 
                recruit "naval triremes"  0  requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, parthia, egyptian, greek, roman, }

                recruit "Xipherai SEAchaean"  0  requires factions { egypt, romans_senate, parthia, } 
                recruit "Xipherai SWAchaean"  0  requires factions { romans_julii, romans_brutii, macedon, }

        {

            {
                farming_level 1
            }
            construction  2 
            cost  600 
            settlement_min town
            upgrades
            {
                farms+1
            }
        }
        farms+1 requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, parthia, egyptian, greek, roman, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                farming_level 2
            }
            construction  3 
            cost  1200

            upgrades

                farms+2
            }
        }

        {
            capability

                farming_level 3
            }

            settlement_min city
            upgrades

                farms+3
            }

            capability

building temple_of_battle
{
    levels temple_of_battle_shrine temple_of_battle_temple temple_of_battle_large_temple temple_of_battle_awesome_temple temple_of_battle_pantheon 
    {
        temple_of_battle_shrine requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, parthia, egyptian, greek, roman, } and hidden_resource noncamp
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 1
            }
            construction  1 
            cost  400 
            settlement_min town
            upgrades
            {
                temple_of_battle_temple
            }
        }
        temple_of_battle_temple requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, parthia, egyptian, greek, roman, } and hidden_resource noncamp
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 2
                recruits_morale_bonus bonus 1
            }
            construction  2 
            cost  800 
            settlement_min large_town
            upgrades
            {
                temple_of_battle_large_temple
            }
        }
        temple_of_battle_large_temple requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, parthia, egyptian, greek, roman, } and hidden_resource noncamp
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 3
                recruits_morale_bonus bonus 2
            }
            construction  3 
            cost  1600 
            settlement_min city
            upgrades
            {
                temple_of_battle_awesome_temple
            }
        }
        temple_of_battle_awesome_temple requires factions { carthaginian, eastern, parthia, egyptian, greek, roman, } and hidden_resource noncamp
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 4
                recruits_morale_bonus bonus 3
            }
            construction  5 
            cost  3200 
            settlement_min large_city
            upgrades
            {
                temple_of_battle_pantheon
            }
        }
        temple_of_battle_pantheon requires factions { carthaginian, eastern, parthia, egyptian, greek, roman, } and hidden_resource noncamp
        {
            capability
            { 
                happiness_bonus bonus 7
                recruits_morale_bonus bonus 4
            }
            construction  6 
            cost  6400 
            settlement_min huge_city
            upgrades
            {
            }
        }
    }
    plugins

}

            }
        }
        temple_of_love_awesome_temple requires factions { carthaginian, eastern, parthia, egyptian, greek, roman, } and hidden_resource noncamp
        {
            capability
            { 
                happiness_bonus bonus 4
                population_growth_bonus bonus 4
            }
            construction  5 
            cost  3200 
            settlement_min large_city
            upgrades
            {
                temple_of_love_pantheon
            }
        }
        temple_of_love_pantheon requires factions { carthaginian, eastern, parthia, egyptian, greek, roman, } and hidden_resource noncamp
        {
            capability
            { 
                happiness_bonus bonus 5
                population_growth_bonus bonus 5
                law_bonus bonus 2
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus 2
                recruits_exp_bonus bonus 1
            }
            construction  6 
            cost  6400 
            settlement_min huge_city
            upgrades
            {
            }
        }
    }
    plugins 
    {
    }
}

        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 1
            }
            construction  1 
            cost  400 
            settlement_min town
            upgrades
            {
                temple_of_naval_temple
            }
        }
        temple_of_naval_temple requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, parthia, egyptian, greek, roman, }

            }

                temple_of_naval_large_temple
            }
        }

            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 3
            }

            }

                happiness_bonus bonus 25

            }
            construction  1 
            cost  400 
            settlement_min town

            }
        }
    }
